title: Marriage and the Margins: a Look at the Church and the LGBTQ Community with Joel
description:
I spoke with friend and fellow YouTuber @TransBruh the other day on the LGBTQ community and the Church. In my prep for that talk I encountered some thought provoking ideas from my friend Joel here, so I decided to invite him on the podcast to discuss them further

Podcast version: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Marriage-and-the-Margins-a-Look-at-the-Church-and-the-LGBTQ-Community-with-Joel-ej5fb3

Conversation with Mars:
https://youtu.be/bXJWFF9uGLw

Follow me on twitter: @AndreaLynnLewis
email me here: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
